title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-1.1 - Applicability of Part 8188
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-1.1 - Applicability of Part 8188

State Regulations
(a) Subparts 8188-2, 8188-3 and 8188-5 of this Part apply to: (1)

All cities except: (i) New York City, Buffalo, Rochester, Yonkers, Syracuse, Albany, Glen Cove, Long Beach and Ithaca; and
(ii)
any city which attains a population of
100,000 or more subsequent to the 1970 Federal census and which adopts a local
law to provide that section
310
of the Real Property Tax Law shall not
be applicable to it. (2)

All towns except towns within Nassau County and Tompkins County. (3)

All counties except Nassau County and the
counties within New York City. (b) Subpart 8188-4 of this Part applies to
all counties except Nassau County, Tompkins County and the counties within New

York City. (c) Subpart 8188-8 of
this Part applies to all assessors employed by the City of New York as provided
in section
8188-8.1
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
